body.name: CRUX x Marshmello 3.0 QT Digital Air Fryer with TurboCrisp Technology, Touch Screen Temperature Control, Timer and Auto Shut-off, Fully Programmable, Silicone Cupcake Molds Included, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 9 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 9 mins
features: PERFECTLY CRISPY, EVERY TIME: Introducing the Marshmello Air Fryer, the first-to-market with TurboCrisp tech for the perfect balance of crunch and moisture. Its powerful 1300 watt heating system delivers fast, juicy and evenly cooked food every meal

HEALTHY AND DELICIOUS: Prepare healthier and tastier meals effortlessly! This high-performance air fryer oven uses up to 75% less fat for delicious recipes and the touch panel control system with pre-programmed cook settings makes cooking convenient

FOR SMALL GATHERINGS: Our stainless steel air fryer is equipped with a 60-min auto shutoff timer and audible tone to make your cooking experience pleasant and laid back. With an 3-quart capacity, the unit can cook up to 2.5 lbs and feed 2-4 people

EASY CLEANING: Our oven air fryer has a dishwasher-safe and PFOA-free non-stick cooking basket and crisping tray which make cleaning up a breeze. Plus, its sleek design and compact size make it a perfect fit for any kitchen style and countertop

BONUS EXTRA FOR EXTRA FUN: Unleash your creativity and prepare unique dinners that will impress your friends and family. Our modern, fun air fryers come with patent-pending TurboCrisp crisping tray & 4 custom CRUX x Marshmello silicone cupcake molds
body.description: You can air fry that! The CRUX x Marshmello 3-qt. Digital Air Fryer Kit features patented TurboCrisp technology crisping tray that cooks up to 50% faster than traditional ovens and 1 silicone baking pan. CRUX is turning up the beat—and the heat with world renowned Artist & Producer, Marshmello. Cooked, puffed, crispy, gooey perfection is yours every time with this 3-qt. Digital Air Fryer Kit from CRUX x Marshmello, sure to become one of your favorite new apartment essentials. Why wait? Add one of our deep fryers to your kitchen appliances collection and start creating magic today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, great size, love the color, works well and the UI is pleasant to look at, a lot of temp control setting for easy customization, easy to clean too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing is super cute and great for small spaces and that solo lifestyle.I haven't had issues with smoke or controls. The controls are super straight forward - played with them for a min and I was on my way to air fryer glory.Really easy to clean and looks great on counter and small enough to store easy. No issues here. Have had a ninja fryer and this one is as good for the reduced cost with better styling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The only problem I have with it is it sets off my smoke detector in a way no other Air Fryer has
reviews.reviewText: I love it, for the most part! It's great at cooking things and I have enjoyed everything that's come out of it. But, for some reason, it repeatedly sets off my smoke detector when I make fries, and I can't figure out how to stop it, and it's very annoying. So, if that persists, I might have to buy a different one that won't do that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value 3QT air fryer
reviews.reviewText: I got this air fryer as a family gift for Christmas. I had been holding off getting an air fryer because we have a really small kitchen with no counter space or storage space. I saw this one come up in my search as a compact air fryer. I read the reviews and purchased the 3 QT. It fits nicely in a small space and looks nice. Better yet, it has worked wonderfully for us. I think one or multiple people in my family have used it every single day since we got it. It cooks food quickly and I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect if for those living solo
reviews.reviewText: It's small, but that's what I needed for my small space. If you eat ridiculous portion sizes, this may not be for you. So far I've cooked eggs on two settings, and the bake setting was better than the air fryer setting. I've also baked some muffins, they came out with a slightly burned top on the bake setting, but I'll try other settings until I get it right. The little muffin cups that were included have useful little handles. It is easy to use, the settings are easy to figure out. Ignore the bad reviews that say the settings are confusing, those people refuse to read or learn. The button icons are pretty easy to guess, but I went through the instructions anyway. Easy and useful kitchen appliance. Small size makes it great to take to work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little machine. Perfect size for 1 person
reviews.reviewText: Very cute looking machine works great and fast, very easy to clean and good quality. Great price also, highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Fryer!
reviews.reviewText: Wanted a fryer in white and reasonably priced. Never used an air fryer so bought a small (3Qt) to try out. This is a great product! Very easy to use. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t really make your chicken wings crispy
reviews.reviewText: Not thrilled about this air fryer. First of all, you have to keep the booklet in hand so you know what the little signs on the machine mean. I’ve cooked my chicken wings in there several times and not once have they ever been crispy. I got rid of my other Air fryer to buy this one because the wattage was higher and it takes just as long to cook. I feel like I wasted my money.
